_header: This is the book that I thee take
Title(s): ‘Doctrina Patris ad Merlinum’; ‘Rhasis Cestrensis de 12 aquis’
Subjects: Merlin; catechisms, science and biblical lore
_description: ‘Rhasis Cestrensis de 12 aquis’ with a prefatory Dialogue between Rhasis and his son Merlin — the opus (‘Doctrina Patris ad Merlinum’) in twenty paragraphs in couplets

BLAdd15549.First Lines:
This ys þe boke þat y þe takeÞat merliouns
                    fadyr to hym con make…
BLAdd15549.Last Lines:
…And all þe holy company of blisThat ay to god praye for
                    vs. Amen
BLAdd15549.Attributed Title: Et sic explicit Liber Merlin (Explicit, f. 168)

RylandsLat405.Editions:
Singer,  Dorothea Waley. 
             Catalogue of Latin and Vernacular Alchemical Manuscripts.
